sentences.english: His brother-in-law sneered . You know what that means.
sentences.chinese: 他的姐夫嘲笑道，你知道那是什麼意思。

sentences.english: Mr. Gardiner soon wrote again to his brother.
sentences.chinese: 嘉丁納先生馬上又寫了封信給他姐夫。

sentences.english: I used to see my brother-in-law two, three times a week.
sentences.chinese: 我過去每週要去看姐夫一兩次。

sentences.english: Her family was quite well-off, and the husband of her eldest sister was the county's governor of the then Republican Government.
sentences.chinese: 家境好，大姐夫又是這個城市裏國民政府的一縣之長。

sentences.english: Small nan is tracking the brother-in-law shuttle friends, lesser sister calling.
sentences.chinese: 小楠正跟蹤着姐夫梭朋，小雅姐打來電話。

sentences.english: My brother - in - law's laugh , which was very infections , broke the silence.
sentences.chinese: 我姐夫那富有感染力的笑聲打破了沉默。

sentences.english: Do you get along with your sisters-in-law?
sentences.chinese: 你和你的姐夫相處得怎麼樣？

sentences.english: Employee's brother-in-law was kidnapped by a drug cartelwhile in Mexico.
sentences.chinese: 姐夫被墨西哥販毒集團綁架。

sentences.english: Employee's brother-in-law was kidnapped by a drug cartel while in Mexico.
sentences.chinese: 姐夫被墨西哥販毒集團綁架。

sentences.english: As my brother-in-law is fond of saying, I just wanted things to work.
sentences.chinese: 正如我姐夫常常愛說的，我只是想讓事情正常運轉。

sentences.english: Chunmei's sister and brother to the grave Chunling silence to her husband.
sentences.chinese: 春梅的妹妹春玲和弟弟到墓前向姐夫默哀。

sentences.english: "My brother-in law had cancer like me. He is dead already, " she said as her infant daughter pulled at her shirt.
sentences.chinese: 我的姐夫和我一樣得了癌症，他已經去世了。

sentences.english: The print on the right wall was given to us by our brother-in-law, Nick.
sentences.chinese: 右面牆上的印刷品是我們姐夫Nick給我們的。

sentences.english: My brother-in-law did a great job with the pushcart design.
sentences.chinese: 我的姐夫在手推車的設計上做的非常好。

sentences.english: Cousin, that, cousin's man is subjected to live you?
sentences.chinese: 表姐，那個，表姐夫受得住你嗎？
